sentences.english: The most obvious example of this is a hardware status register.
sentences.chinese: 最明顯的例子，這是一個硬體狀態寄存器。

sentences.english: Not all hardware adapters and features are supported at this time.
sentences.chinese: 此階段並沒有支援所有的硬體配接卡與功能。

sentences.english: Critics said that Amanda is the sex symbol of the hard-bodied athletic world.
sentences.chinese: 批評者說，阿曼達是象徵性的運動世界的硬體。

sentences.english: The robot structures of hardware and software are also proposed to explain the design principles.
sentences.chinese: 對於機器人軟體硬體架構也提出說明。

sentences.english: The implementation results are also provided to conclude this paper.
sentences.chinese: 最後於結論中提供硬體實現的結果。

sentences.english: The availability of such a counter depends on the processor hardware of your computer.
sentences.chinese: 是否提供這類計數器則根據您電腦的處理器硬體而定。

sentences.english: The console port does not support hardware flow control .
sentences.chinese: 主控臺埠不支援硬體流量控制。

sentences.english: When you see rendering artifacts in an application, try turning off hardware acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 在應用程式中看見轉譯疊影時，請嘗試關閉硬體加速。

sentences.english: A most common method of connecting add-on printed circuit boards to computer hardware.
sentences.chinese: 在電腦硬體上，它是接駁擴展印刷線路板的常用方法。

sentences.english: How do I find out what version of hardware I have?
sentences.chinese: 我要如何找到你所使用的硬體版本資訊？

sentences.english: The programs implemented in either software and (or) firmware that makes the computer hardware usable.
sentences.chinese: 系統程式就是驅動電腦硬體工作之軟體及軔體程式。

sentences.english: Gets the maximum width and height for bitmap creation of the underlying hardware device.
sentences.chinese: 取得基礎硬體裝置建立點陣圖時的最大寬度和高度。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to exploit (a resource)/to open up (for development)/to develop
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
